maryxml:
"I might be a bit crook and a bit scarred, but I'm OK and I'm really going to claw my way back - and I really want to do something with my life. "Sometimes in life it takes a knock to remember what we really value!"
"I might be a bit crook and a bit scarred, but I'm OK and I'm really going to claw my way back - and I really want to do something with my life. "Sometimes in life it takes a knock to remember what we really value!"
